metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32743 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: Samba does not validate the Validated-DNS-Host-Name right for the dNSHostName attribute which could permit unprivileged users to write it.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per comments #11 and #12 in the upstream bug, this is a low-severity issue. Setting priority to low. Upstream Samba project did not publish updates for stable releases below 4.17.x

criterions.comment: samba package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
